channel.title: Drivers License on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Drivers License on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Identifying a Real Fake
item.description: Today in Tedium: True storyâ€”over the weekend, a restaurant attempted to suggest that I had a fake ID. The ID was a few years old, granted, and it has a small crack in it, but it nonetheless was a real form of identification. The waiter made a joke along the lines of the ID looking like a fake ID he used in college, which seemed like a bad joke until a few minutes later, when the manager came out and asked to look at it.
